00008 std::string ORTrig4ChanDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00009 {
00010   switch(iPar) {
00011     case 0: return "trigger";
00012     case 1: return "UpClock";
00013     case 2: return "LowClock";
00014     default:
00015       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00016                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00017       return "unknown";
00018   }
00019 }
00020 
00021 UInt_t ORTrig4ChanDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t /*iRow*/)
00022 {
00023   switch(iPar) {
00024     case 0: return trigOf(record);
00025     case 1: return UpClockOf(record);
00026     case 2: return LowClockOf(record);
00027     default:
00028       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00029                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00030       return 0;
00031   }
00032 }
